verses.verse: And the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me came again <WH7725>, and waked <WH5782> me, as a man <WH376> that is wakened <WH5782> out of his sleep <WH8142>,

And said <WH559> unto me, What seest <WH7200> thou? And I said <WH559>, I have looked <WH7200>, and behold a candlestick <WH4501> all of gold <WH2091>, with a bowl <WH1531> upon the top <WH7218> of it, and his seven <WH7651> lamps <WH5216> thereon, and seven <WH7651> pipes <WH4166> to the seven <WH7651> lamps <WH5216>, which are upon the top <WH7218> thereof: a bowl: Heb. her bowl seven pipes: or, seven several pipes to the lamps
And two <WH8147> olive trees <WH2132> by it, one <WH259> upon the right <WH3225> side of the bowl <WH1543>, and the other <WH259> upon the left <WH8040> side thereof.
So I answered <WH6030> and spake <WH559> to the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me, saying <WH559>, What are these, my lord <WH113>?
Then the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> unto me, Knowest <WH3045> thou not what these be? And I said <WH559>, No, my lord <WH113>.

Then he answered <WH6030> and spake <WH559> unto me, saying <WH559>, This is the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> unto Zerubbabel <WH2216>, saying <WH559>, Not by might <WH2428>, nor by power <WH3581>, but by my spirit <WH7307>, saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>. might: or, army

Who art thou, O great <WH1419> mountain <WH2022>? before <WH6440> Zerubbabel <WH2216> thou shalt become a plain <WH4334>: and he shall bring forth <WH3318> the headstone <WH68> <WH7222> thereof with shoutings <WH8663>, crying, Grace <WH2580>, grace <WH2580> unto it.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559>,

The hands <WH3027> of Zerubbabel <WH2216> have laid the foundation <WH3245> of this house <WH1004>; his hands <WH3027> shall also finish <WH1214> it; and thou shalt know <WH3045> that the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> hath sent <WH7971> me unto you.

For who hath despised <WH936> the day <WH3117> of small things <WH6996>? for they shall rejoice <WH8055>, and shall see <WH7200> the plummet <WH68> <WH913> in the hand <WH3027> of Zerubbabel <WH2216> with those seven <WH7651>; they are the eyes <WH5869> of the LORD <WH3068>, which run to and fro <WH7751> through the whole earth <WH776>. for they: or, since the seven eyes of the Lord shall rejoice plummet: Heb. stone of tin
Then answered <WH6030> I, and said <WH559> unto him, What are these two <WH8147> olive trees <WH2132> upon the right <WH3225> side of the candlestick <WH4501> and upon the left <WH8040> side thereof?

And I answered <WH6030> again <WH8145>, and said <WH559> unto him, What be these two <WH8147> olive <WH2132> branches <WH7641> which through <WH3027> the two <WH8147> golden <WH2091> pipes <WH6804> empty <WH7324> the golden <WH2091> oil out of themselves? through: Heb. by the hand empty: or, empty out of themselves oil into the gold the golden oil: Heb. the gold
And he answered <WH559> me and said <WH559>, Knowest <WH3045> thou not what these be? And I said <WH559>, No, my lord <WH113>.
Then said <WH559> he, These are the two <WH8147> anointed <WH3323> ones <WH1121>, that stand <WH5975> by the Lord <WH113> of the whole earth <WH776>. anointed: Heb. sons of oil
